title: Design Document_ Generic Execution Engine and Modeler.pdf
summary: Generic Execution Engine and Modeler provides a powerful, extensible platform for automating and orchestrating workflows across various domains. It uses a visual process modeler (e.g., BPMN) and a token-based execution engine. It offers the ability to: Model and visualize business processes or automated workflows in real-time. Track execution state through immutable tokens for auditability and historical analysis.
